hr.p:
The following form must be completed and submitted if your student will be attending Kindergarten in 2020-2021:
New Student Registration

Parents or guardians should use the following assessments and the attached rubric to evaluate and prepare your children for Kindergarten next year:
Kindergarten Assessment

hr.p: Do you have scenes of our valley that you would like to see on our webpage? We will add the best that is turned into us, just email them to info(at)sd148.org.
